title: La Guerra Infinita 02 - Afghanistan - The Infinite War EN Subtit
description:
This folder consists of:

1. .avi file -- La Guerra Infinita 02 - Afghanistan.avi	
This is the same file that is already available for torrent download at mininova torrent site, where it was misspelled making it very difficult for someone to find. If you have downloaded this earlier you can uncheck it. It is not the same file of 600MB as was put by me on the pirate bay, user Misko Mitrovic

2. .srt file - la guerra infinita 02 - Afghanistan.srt is subtitle file for English

3. The Infinite War 02 English Transcript.doc
This is full transcript of the episode in English

4. Read Me.doc file with instructions how to use subtitles, if you are not familiar with that.

While trying to understand the situation in Kosovo Riccardo Iacona from RAI TRE discovers that Kosovo Mafia is organizing drug trafficking inside Europe. Following the drug paths he Arrives to Afghanistan where links between drug trafficking and terrorism become even more obvious.
